Today's Whakataukī

"Mā te kōrero, ka mōhio; mā te mōhio, ka mārama; mā te mārama, ka mātau; mā te mātau, ka ora."

Through discussion comes awareness; through awareness comes understanding; through understanding comes knowledge; through knowledge comes life.

"Whaowhia te kete mātauranga"

Fill the basket of knowledge

Quality teaching resources for Aotearoa New Zealand educators, honoring mātauranga Māori and contemporary pedagogy.
